node.title: Respecting Food
node.label: 11. September 2020
node.introduction: Have you ever thought about the meals you eat and given them a respect ranking? What does this even mean?

node.title: Top Tips for Picky Eaters
node.label: 10. September 2020
node.introduction: Some people just don't like a lot of food or let's just say, they like what they like and that's all there is to it!

node.title: Raspberry Ripple Pancakes with Pineapple Skewers
node.introduction: These quick pancakes are fun to make and have a pleasing pink ripple effect due to the crushed raspberries. Serve with a big dollop of yogurt and the pineapple skewers on the side and this basic recipe can be a tasty and nutritious breakfast, brunch or snack.

node.cover_image_alt: Raspberry Ripple Pancakes with Pineapple Skewers.

node.title: Sweetcorn Pancakes & Tomato Salsa
node.introduction: Sometimes you just need a little change from the usual pancakes. This is where these savoury Mexican inspired pancakes come into their own. Served with the salsa and a nice home made guacamole you can't really go wrong. Best of all you can pack in 2 or 3 portions of veg and kids love them too.

node.title: Kachumba Salad
node.introduction: Kachumber is a quick and easy salad that can be served as a side to many Indian dishes. It adds crunch, flavor and texture to foods and works well with hot and spicy dishes. As well as having the added benefit of increasing your daily vegetable intake the ingredients offer a wealth of vitamins and minerals. It keeps well in the fridge for 2-3 days and is also perfect for take along lunches or picnics.

node.text:
It's the weekend so that can only mean one thing! Yep you guessed it cake!

Hazelnut beetroot and chocolate torte.

I like to bake at the weekend, it gives me something to look forward to all week! 

Admittedly I sometimes do a midweek bake too but usually it's just at the weekend. It helps me unwind and win win there's a cake at the end of it!
 
Just look at that vibrant beautiful pink, it makes me so happy seeing it and I just know it's going to taste amazing!! üòé

If you bake when do you do it? 

#theweekendbake #beetrootbaby #chocolateistheanswer #cakecanbehealthy #keepingitreal #rebalancingyou #rebalancingyoucommunity #foodhasfunction #eatyourcolours

Happy birthday to me!! Second lockdown birthday! Can't complain was filled with lots of nice food! Pancakes & prosseco for breakfast, risotto and prosecco for lunch and sausage & mash and prosecco for dinner! Think there's a theme developing here! üçæü•Ç Ooh and a pornstar martini, chocolates and cake!! Yum!! 
#only44once #happybirthdaytome #lockdownbirthday #8020lifestyle #prosecco #pancakeheaven #rebalancingyou

Happy Sunday everyone! 

I'm enjoying a solo blissful breakfast! 
Nobody is up yet and so this precious time is being enjoyed to the absolute max. 
Even though it's just me I like to hit all the senses and enjoy every mouthful. It's not just about texture, taste and nutrition I like to  enjoy the visual aspect too. 
Taking the time to sit down and eat mindfully is so important for digestive health and function, plus making every meal look beautiful is an act of self love!
So get out that best plate, napkin or pretty glass and indulge. 

HOW TO EAT MINDFULLY - 
‚úîÔ∏èBefore each meal take a few deep breaths and think about the food about to be eaten
‚úîÔ∏èPut down your knife and fork in-between mouthfuls
‚úîÔ∏èChew your food well, trying to eat slowly

#selfcare #selflove #rebalancingyou #eatsolo #enjoyyourfood #thebestbreakfast #digestivehealthmatters #nutritionaltherapy
#goodguthealth #slowdown #senses #personalisedgifts #sundaybreakfastvibes #glutenfree #dairyfree #greensmoothies #allthecolours #prettyfood #bemindful #guthealthiswhereitsat #mindfuleating

metadata.siteDescription: ENERGISE, RESTORE, NOURISH. I'm studying with the renowned Institute for Optimum Nutrition and will qualify next year. Until then, this is a place to inspire and share healthful information, tips, tricks and recipes. I hope to energise, restore and nourish your body mind and soul!
